prompt: Subject: The Woman (late 20s, warm brown shoulder-length hair). Context: Cozy, lived-in apartment at night, surrounded by warm lamp light and personal items (art, books) reflecting her personality. Action: Reading a book, gently turning a page, pausing to glance up with a soft, content smile. Style: Soft, warm, cinematic aesthetic. Camera Motion & Angle: Slow dolly in from eye level. Composition: Medium shot (showing the cozy apartment) transitioning to a close-up on her hands turning the page and her thoughtful face. Ambiance: Warm golden lamp light, earthy color palette (browns, beiges, soft golds).
label: story
